You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesU U] > &ucy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ucy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0423/index.htm U+00423].
  * `&ucy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0443/index.htm U+00443].
